origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_market_analysis', 'description': 'This function retrieves the market analysis report for a specified year and industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the market analysis is requested.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry for which the market analysis is requested, e.g., insurance, tech, finance.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The market analysis report for the specified year and industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_market_analysis, 它的参数输入如下: 'year'是'2023', 'industry'是'insurance'.
